node_type.value: No build output yet. Select a task to run.

value.value: flex items-center justify-between px-3 py-2 border-t border-[#3c3c3c] bg-[#252526] text-[11px]

handlers.name: handleBuildMessage
handlers.body_summary:
(message: any) => {
    switch (message.type) {
      case 'output':
        addOutput(message.content, detectOutputType(message.content))
        break

      case 'progress':
        setBuildProgress(message.progress)
        break

      case 'complete':
        const success = message.exitCode === 0
        setBuildStatus(success ? 'success' : 'failed')
        addOutput('', 'default')
        addOutput(
          success
            ? `[SUCCESS] Build completed in ${formatDuration(message.duration)}`
            : `[FAILED] Build failed with exit code ${message.exitCode}`,
          success ? 'success' : 'error'
        )

        if (currentTask) {
          const historyItem: BuildHistory = {
            id: `history-${Date.now()}`,
            taskId: currentTask.id,
            taskName: currentTask.name,
            status: success ? 'success' : 'failed',
            startTime: new Date(Date.now() - message.duration),
            endTime: new Date(),
            duration: message.duration,
            exitCode: message.exitCode,
          }
          setBuildHistory((prev) => [historyItem, ...prev.slice(0, 19)])
        }
        break

      case 'error':
        addOutput(`[ERROR] ${message.message}`, 'error')
        setBuildStatus('failed')
        break
    }
  }

patterns.sigil:
// Inline in the message that changes count:
on Increment { self.count += 1; self.save(); }
